attributes.additional_details:
The Department of Health's national HPV vacccination programme of year 8 school girls does not follow the vaccine manufacturer's safety rules eg. this vaccine MUST NOT BE PRESCRIBED without first checking the patients full medical records and should not be prescribed to someone with an immune dysfunction, etc, Derbyshire NHS PCT has now changed to provide this vaccines in GP's surgeries which is a step in the right direction.
The NHS must also be transparent, open and honest and inform girls and their parents of the possibility of serious adverse reactions that can cripple for life so that an INFORMED choice can be made.
